CarbonTracker CREATE NEW JOURNEY CREATE NEW UTILITY BILL EDIT/DELETE UTILITY BILL VIEW CARBON FOOTPRINT\ Displacement vol: %1$f Transmission type: %2$s %1$s $2$s %3$d %4$s Select your car in this journey from the drop down list. 
Press Edit/Delete Car to edit/delete selected car. 
Press New Car to add new car to the list SELECT CAR NEW CAR EDIT/DELETE CAR Error: No car currently available Enter Nickname: Nickname Error: Nickname must contain at least 1 character Car has been deleted Save the following change: %1$s ? Saved edited information Select Make: Select Model: Select Year: Search Select your car model: OK CANCEL Car already existed Select your route for this journey from the drop down list. 
Press Edit/Delete Route to edit/delete selected route. 
Press New Route to add new route to the list. SELECT ROUTE NEW ROUTE EDIT ROUTE DELETE ROUTE Error: No route available for select Route Name: City Distance(km): Highway Distance(km) ADD ROUTE Load completed Load Make completed Your selected entry is: %1s Edit Car Nickname: Edit Car Entries(Make, Model, Year): Do you want to delete this route? billing date: Select first date of your bill Select last date of your bill Number of people: People in household ADD BILL Electricity Gas Error: Amount of consumption must be greater than 0 Error: Amount of people must be greater than 0 Error: Not all entries required are filled Select the bill you want to retrieve from the drop down menu.
